document_data.name: Claire
document_data.mainbody: '''Claire''' was a [[courtesan (prostitute)|courtesan]] who was enslaved by Lady [[Galvena]].
document_data.History: Claire was to be married to a trader called [[Sanik]], and they planned to elope. However, as her mistress, believed that Claire was her "property", she would not allow for this. Consequently, Claire's husband-to-be was assassinated, and she was ordered to be tortured to death.
document_data.Rumors: It was rumored that Claire, whilst undergoing torture and condemnation by Lady Galvena, was rescued by [[Gorion's Ward]]. She was informed of Sanik's death, and was deeply saddened. She sought safety under Sanik's captain, [[Golin]].
